duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct reconnaissance and intensive-level historic structures and landscape surveys.
Prepare eligibility survey forms for various states.
Complete National Register Nominations; and Prepare Determination of Eligibility Reports.
Knowledge of Mid-Atlantic regional architectural history.
Excellent written and verbal communications skills.
Manage multiple tasks, take initiative, and work in a team environment.
Familiarity with Section 106 of the National Historic Preservation Act, the ability to prepare Effects Reports, and familiarity with HABS/HAER/HALS documentation.

education_certification.credential: MA or MS degree in Architectural History, Historic Preservation, or closely related field (BA with coursework in architectural history/historic preservation and at least two years of experience will also be considered)
